CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Leade") , "Leaderboard", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Twit"), "Twitter", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Social"), "Social Share", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Video"), "Video Gallery", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "B2B"), "B2B Bolt", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Bolt"), "Bolt", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Slide"), "SlideShare", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Ideas"), "Ideas", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Quest"), "Questionnaire", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Profile"), "Profile", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Migr"), "Migration", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Guide"), "Guide Me", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Conta"), "Contact Us", IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "Page"), "Page Info", "") ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: AppX App Type
